content:
Sure! Here are the updated, more creative and concise email templates:

Step 7: Personalized Demo Offer (Sent 3 days after Step 6)
Subject Line: "Ready to see OutSystems in action?"
Body:
Dear [Name],

I hope you enjoyed the insights and Q&A session with our OutSystems expert. If you're ready to see the platform in action, I'd like to offer you a personalized demo session.

I want to thank you for your time and show you how OutSystems can benefit your organization. Let's schedule a time that works for you.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

Step 8: Scheduling the Personalized Demo (Sent 4 days after Step 7)
Subject Line: "Let's Schedule Your Personalized OutSystems Demo"
Body:
Dear [Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up on our offer for a personalized demo session of OutSystems.

Please let me know your availability, and I'll schedule a time that works for both of us.

Looking forward to connecting with you soon!

Best regards,
[Your Name]
